Portable Document Format (PDF) is a file format developed by Adobe to present documents.
PDF（Portable Document Format，便携式文档格式）是由Adobe开发的用于呈现文档的文件格式。
Portable Document Format (PDF) is a file format developed by Adobe to present documents.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/Barcode/product features/generate-and-decode-vector-pdf-barcode.md

Based on the PostScript language, each PDF file encapsulates a complete description of a fixed-layout flat document, including the text, fonts, vector graphics, raster images and other information needed to display it.
基于PostScript语言，每个PDF文件都封装了固定布局平面文档的完整描述，包括文本、字体、矢量图形、光栅图像和显示它所需的其他信息。

Based on the PostScript language, each PDF file encapsulates a complete description of a fixed-layout flat document, including the text, fonts, vector graphics, raster images and other information needed to display it.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/Barcode/product features/generate-and-decode-vector-pdf-barcode.md
A barcode or bar code is a method of representing data in a visual, machine-readable form.
条码是一种以视觉、机器可读的形式表示数据的方法。
A barcode or bar code is a method of representing data in a visual, machine-readable form.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/Barcode/product features/generate-and-decode-vector-pdf-barcode.md
It can be stored as a raster image or a vector graphic in PDF.
它可以存储为光栅图像或矢量图形，并保存在PDF中。
It can be stored as a raster image or a vector graphic in PDF.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/Barcode/product features/generate-and-decode-vector-pdf-barcode.md
It is common to find barcodes as images in PDF and there are not many articles about vector barcodes in PDF.
作为图像存在PDF中的条码比较常见，而关于PDF中矢量条码的文章不多。
It is common to find barcodes as images in PDF and there are not many articles about vector barcodes in PDF.
/C:/Users/admin/Desktop/codepool/_blogs/Barcode/product features/generate-and-decode-vector-pdf-barcode.md

So in this article, we are going to talk about how to generate a PDF with vector barcodes and read barcodes from it.

由于我们可以直接获得矢量条码的黑条或白条的坐标，因此从矢量图形解码的性能和准确性会优于从光栅图像解码。
Since we can directly get the coordinates of the black or white bars of a vector barcode, its performance and accuracy are better than decoding a raster image.
